Changes the visibility of a source.

Changing visiblity of sources residing in groups has inconsistent results. It is advised to use nested scenes instead.
Box Name Type Description
scene-name String (optional) Scene name containing the source. Leave blank for current active scene.
item String Source name
visible boolean True for visible, False for not visible or Toggle to invert current visibility status
Toggle should be used only if itâ€™s a single button command.
